entry.title: Russia Strikes Ukrainian Cities With Drones as Fighting Rages in the South
entry.content: Moscow has increased its missile and drone attacks on Ukrainian cities in part to prevent Kyiv from deploying more of its scarce air-defense systems to the front line in the south.

entry.title: Schools in Occupied Ukraine Seek to Turn Children Into Loyal Russians
entry.content: An overhaul of the curriculum is a central thrust in the Kremlinâ€™s effort to erase Ukrainian identity and consolidate its hold on captured territories.
